thread.title: BRIEF-Home Bancshares Says Fall In Federal Corporate Tax Rate To Negatively Impact Co's Q4 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Home Bancshares Says Fall In Federal Corporate Tax Rate To Negatively Impact Co's Q4 Results
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Home Bancshares Inc:
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.22 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* - ‍PERFORMED A PRELIMINARY ANALYSIS TO DETERMINE IMPACT OF REVALUATION OF DEFERRED TAX ASSET OF APPROXIMATELY $113.5 MILLION​
* HOME BANCSHARES SEES NEGATIVE IMPACT TO Q4 EARNINGS OF ABOUT $0.22/SHARE FROM DTA REVALUATION
* HOME BANCSHARES - FALL IN FEDERAL CORPORATE TAX RATE TO NEGATIVELY IMPACT CO‘S Q4 2017 RESULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
